review:
Voy a ir a la contra y recomendarlo en vez de darle negativo.

No voy a hacer review a estas alturas por 2 motivos.
> Si lo odias, lo odias (el por que es cosa tuya, pero dudo que sea tu opiniÃ³n de verdad y no la de otros)
> Si te gusta, te gusta (el por que es cosa tuya, pero dudo que sea por que realmente te divierte y te incita a seguir jugando)

Y para mi que es? Algo que juego en lo que salta la partida en otra cosa, algo que juego de forma casual un rato y lo dejo, algo que echo 3 o 4 runs de vez en cuando y paro por que termina sacÃ¡ndome de quicio y siempre vuelve a mi memoria overwatch 1...

EstÃ¡ divertido? Un rato si. Pero poco mas.
Si nunca jugaste a overwarch 1, este te va a saber a... a poco en realidad Te va a parecer que tiene potencial, y no llega... Como si faltase algo (y es que falta en realidad xD Es el 1, pero con la mitad del contenido).
Y si jugaste, bueno, ya sabes lo que es el 2 (por que sin duda lo has probado) y si no, te lo resumirÃ© asÃ­: Es Overwatch 0.50, con pase de batalla de pago, con skins de pago, con... Todo es de pago en realidad... Ahora han metido moneda como en el 1 para comprar cosas y demÃ¡s, pero da igual, el daÃ±o ya estÃ¡ hecho... Se prometieron muchas cosas y no han cumplido ninguna...
Hasta ahora!!! Que por 40â‚¬ >CUARENTA< te dan 3 chorradas pve para hacer.... Que.... bueno, si pagas por ello, casi que pides a gritos ser estafado...

Pero como dije antes, voy a ir a la contra y recomendarlo en vez de darle negativo.
Y no solo eso, voy a decir una cosa BUENA. Si seÃ±or, has leÃ­do bien, UNA COSA BUENA (que no hace al juego bueno, sigue siendo el mismo juego)...

No hace falta la aplicaciÃ³n de battlenet!

Si! Puedes jugar sin tenerla instalada o lanzada!!! un launcher menos! (sigues necesitando cuenta de failtivision blozzard)

Veis? una cosa buena! Un launcher menos en el sistema que no hace mas que estorbar! Que siii... que solo ocupa unos megas... Pero esos megas se pueden ocupar con vÃ­deos no oficiales de widoEJEM... Con cosas mas productivas.

dogshit money grabber, too bad ow1 was actually enjoyable, just play something else instead

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

En tant que joueur depuis Overwatch 1, je tenais Ã  dire deux mots sur Overwatch 2.

En gros, Overwatch 2 est l'inverse de son prÃ©dÃ©cesseur, dommage qu'on ne peut pas faire machine arriÃ¨re.
De plus, la grande spÃ©cialitÃ© d'Overwatch 2 c'Ã©tait le PvE tel qu'on nous l'avait annoncÃ© (avec des arbres de compÃ©tences ect...) il Ã©tait annoncÃ© payant ce qui est comprÃ©hensible pour le travail qu'il y AURAIT EU derriÃ¨re.
Sauf que non, Ã  cause d'un Ã©diteur Ã  vide de pognon, une Ã©quipe de dÃ©veloppeurs flemmards (comme les Ã©vÃ©nements, les mÃªmes en boucle et quand un Ã©vÃ©nement change (comme l'Ã©venement pride) le seul truc qui change c'est un passage piÃ©ton sur une map et des icones moisies, utile pour cacher la flemme(d'ailleurs c'est sÃ»r que de nous apprendre que Phrarah est lesbienne Ã§a allait vous pardonner)) on a eu un jeu identique au prÃ©dÃ©cesseur et dont les nouveautÃ©s sont bÃ¢clÃ©es. Le PvE est payant mais pour celui qu'on nous a donnÃ© contre celui qu'on nous a promis c'est de l'arnaque (d'ailleurs, PvE qui se concentre sur le lore mais le lore d'Overwatch c'est juste les gentils trÃ¨s mignons contre les vilains trÃ¨s mÃ©chants) . 
Le passage en Free-to-play Ã©tait la plus grosse erreur car en faisant Ã§a, ils se sont permis de supprimer les lootbox (dont la plupart qu'on avait sans payer) et la communautÃ© est devenue enfantine.
Il n'y a plus aucune saveur en chaque partie, tout est monotone, grossiÃ¨rement on s'emmerde.
C'est vraiment dÃ©plorable d'avoir vu ce jeu s'Ã©crouler pour une histoire d'argent.
Du coup, je me suis tournÃ© vers Team Fortress 2, le fps de Valve et croyez moi que TF2 n'a rien Ã  envier chez Blizzard (notamment le lore et le caractÃ¨re de ses personnages, juste regardez la diffÃ©rence entre le Medic, homme charismatique et fou qui adore la violence et qui la transmet en soignant ses alliÃ©s pour qu'ils puissent continuer Ã  la provoquer, et Ange, qui soigne parce qu'elle est gentille.) 

En clair, n'y touchez pas, sauf si vous adorez Ãªtre Ã  dÃ©couvert pour une recoloration du skin de base et un tag, sauf si vous Ãªtes sado maso, ou sauf si vous avez 11 ans ou moins.

id rather watch the porn than be let down by another developer update again

Do i recommend playing this game to play with friends? Yes. At a core this game might be the most fun FPS game there ever was. It has a hero cast that anyone can enjoy and the game does feel very good to play until you start to notice all the bads the game has that will make your hair grey within a span of a year. The first 3 years of the game was phenomenal, Best game ever phenomenal.. But after that they absolutely destroyed this game and yet i kept playing for 3 more years, Why? Because this game at it's core is still good.. I dropped this game because it was getting too frustrating in competitive mode and i don't really play this game casually in quickplay because i think that's the boring version of the game. There was nothing more fun than seeing self improvement and your rank reflect from that but as time went on they started changing stuff.. Now ever since Overwatch 2 the ranks are inflated, pretty much anyone can be masters/Grandmaster now if you put more than 2 hours a day into it. This was NOT the case before. There are an incredible amount of cheaters and that didn't really get any better once this game went free 2 play. So remember that 3 year drought we used to have just so they could focus on the PVE version of the game? Yea, Big fricking mistake Blizzard.. That was really enjoyable to play the game in the most horrible state it was ever been for 3 years just for you to cancel the whole PVE idea anyway and sell it in small bulks for a pretty ridiculous price. What has this game become? If you focused on PVP all those years the game would have been fine.. You know? Why your Overwatch fans started playing games! This game can still be turned around but they just refuse to do so. But hey Illari.. The new support is extremely fun to play ^^ But it's yet another dps disguised as a support you can't fool me, She pretty much replaced Cassidy at this point. I will say.. +1 point for the Steam release and i hope all Blizzard games come to steam because it's just the better platform.
